programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When an unknown assailant guns down sheriff-elect Derwin Brown shortly after winning his election, investigators suspect a political assassination, only to instead uncover an extensive trail of corruption.

programme.title: Bright Now
programme.desc: Today, 24-hour forecasts are 95% reliable and 3-day forecasts are 80% reliable. How do scientists predict the weather and, each year, improve their predictions? It's a race against time using the latest technologies.

programme.title: Bright Now
programme.desc: The human body is a wonderfully complex machine and scientists are only beginning to understand why some humans can survive extremely low temperatures.

programme.title: Bright Now
programme.desc: Could you find a way to survive in a post-apocalyptic world? Explore what it would take to stay alive following a global cataclysm, and what knowledge we would need to rebuild civilization as we know it.

programme.title: Bright Now
programme.desc: Israeli defense experts shed light on advances in artificial intelligence and machine learning in the military defense sector.
